title: K.Pone.Inc
text:
KPoneInc also known as KPoneInc Music Group is a music entertainment group established in 2002 by Cyril Kamar better known by his stage name as <a href="K.Maro">K.Maro</a>.
KPoneInc. Music Group goes into music production, promotion and distribution and has its own record label K.Pone.Inc record label. The music group has signed a national distribution agreement for its entire catalogue and record label releases with <a href="Warner%20Music">Warner Music</a>.
KPoneInc has its own "KPoneInc" record label, that has signed the artists Ale Dee, Imposs, Shy'm and Vaï.
Ale Dee.
<a href="Ale%20Dee">Ale Dee</a> (real name Alexandre Duhaime) is a <a href="Trois-Rivi%C3%A8res">Trois-Rivières</a> <a href="Quebec">Quebec</a> <a href="rapping">rapper</a>. He has released three albums: "Mine de rien" (2006), "Pour le love pis l'cash" (2008) and "Entre la mine et l'papier" (2010)
Imposs.
<a href="Imposs">Imposs</a> (real name S. Rimsky Salgado) is a Canadian <a href="rapper">rapper</a> of Haitian origin based in Montreal <a href="Quebec">Quebec</a>. Before becoming a solo artist, he was part of <a href="Muzion">Muzion</a>, one of the well-known <a href="hip%20hop">hip hop</a> bands of Quebec. First album release with K.Pone was in 2008.
K.Maro.
<a href="K.Maro">K.Maro</a> (real name Cyril Kamar) is a Canadian <a href="Hip%20hop%20music">hip hop</a> and <a href="R%26amp%3BB">R&B</a> singer-songwriter and producer of <a href="Lebanese%20Canadians">Lebanese</a> origin. He raps in French and in English. He is founder and CEO of KPoneInc Music Group and KPoneInc record label.
Shy'm.
<a href="Shy%27m">Shy'm</a> (real name Tamara Marthe) is a French <a href="contemporary%20R%26amp%3BB">R&B</a> singer. She released her debut album, "Mes Fantaisies", in 2006 which rose to No. 5 in the French chart. To date, four songs from the album have been released as singles, all of which charted in the top 10 in France.
Vaï.
<a href="Va%C3%AF">Vaï</a> (real name Adil Takhssait) is a Canadian (<a href="Quebec">Quebec</a>) <a href="Rapping">rap</a> and <a href="hip-hop">hip-hop</a> musician of Moroccan origin. He was earlier part of <a href="LMDS%20%28band%29">Les Messagers du Son</a> (<a href="LMDS%20%28band%29">LMDS</a>) as Mélo (Melopsy) alongside K.Maro (stage name Lyrik) in LMDS).
